description:
Sim Update 4 is the "performance beta" we've been waiting for, and the 2D gains are REAL. But this performance came at a cost.

Join me for a full brain dump as I review the "secret sauce" behind the new speed and the big community-requested fixes (goodbye, blurry night lighting!).


But we'll also dive into the "other side of the coin":

- The "fundamentally broken" VR experience 
- The un-fixed mouse cursor bug 
- The addon "minefield" that's crashing complex planes 
- New features like Helicopter VRS Protection 

Is the performance boost worth the instability? This video will help you decide.
